name: We Broke Up
description: Longtime couple Lori and Doug break up just days before Lori's little sister Bea's wedding to Jayson. In order to not disrupt the fun, they decide to pretend they're still together until the weekend is over.

review.author: pcb1965
review.heading: Depressing
review.reviewBody: This was in the comedy section. Not only was it depressing, it never really went anywhere. The female lead (Lori) was totally unlikeable and I really couldn't figure out why the male lead (Doug) would stay with her anyway.

keywords: wedding,breakup,cabin,reference to paul bunyan,scene during end credits
